componentType.description: cursor position control via crosshair movement

inputPort.description: horizontal movement acceleration, increasing px/second per second
vertical movement acceleration, increasing px/second per second

outputPort.description: the filename of the selected tooltip icon.

eventListenerPort.description: if available, show tooltip icons and activate tooltip mode
navigates to next tooltip, if tooltips are currently activated
navigates to previous tooltip, if tooltips are currently activated
moves to last stable x/y cursor position without movement
highlights the X-Axis in red color, disables highlight for Y-Axis and sets property autoColorAxis to false
highlights the Y-Axis in red color, disables highlight for Y-Axis and sets property autoColorAxis to false
toggles the highlighting for the X- and Y-Axis, sets property autoColorAxis to false

eventTriggererPort.description: this event is generated after an inactivity of clickEventTime milliseconds
this event is generated when a tooltip icon has been selected after an inactivity of clickEventTime milliseconds

property.name: absoluteValues
property.description: if true, x/y input port values are absolute coordinates, else relative coordinates

property.name: autoColorAxis
property.description: if true, the axis are colored automatically according to the current movement

property.name: highlightClick
property.description: if true, the axis are shortly colored green for indicating the clickEvent

property.name: wrapAround
property.description: if true, movement continues on other side of the screen, if screen end reached

property.name: clickEventTime
property.description: if not zero, the click event is created after n millseconds inactivity

property.name: baseVelocity
property.description: base movement velocity in px per second

property.name: accelerationH
property.description: horizontal movement acceleration, increasing px/second per second

property.name: accelerationV
property.description: vertical movement acceleration, increasing px/second per second

property.name: maxVelocity
property.description: maximum movement velocity in px per second

property.name: tooltipFolder
property.description: folder which contains tooltip icons in .png format

property.name: tooltipStartIndex
property.description: start index for first shown tooltip
